attributes.action: INTRODUCE PENALTY FARES FOR PEOPLE WHO MAKE TOO MUCH NOISE THAT DISTURBS OTHER TENANTS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NTRODUCE PENALTY FARES (OR/AND CONFISCATE HI-FI EQUIPMENT) FOR PEOPLE WHO MAKE TOO MUCH NOISE THAT DISTURBS OTHER TENANTS IN HOUSES

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
